item.title: Russia Pummels Kyiv in Apparent Retaliation for Ukrainian Drone Assault
item.description: The attack on Friday, which killed at least four people nationwide, came two days after Russia vowed retaliation for an audacious drone assault on its...

item.title: Interpol Arrests 20 Over Network That Distributed Child Sex Abuse Material
item.description: The international sweep included arrests in 12 countries across Europe and the Americas. The agency said there were also dozens of other suspects.

item.title: Arise, Sir David Beckham: The Soccer Star Will Be Knighted
item.description: The British news media reported that the on-field golden boy and international celebrity will receive the honor from King Charles III.

item.title: Who Is Yasser Abu Shabab, the Leader of the Israeli-Backed Militia in Gaza?
item.description: Yasser Abu Shabab, a Bedouin man in his 30s, holds sway in eastern Rafah, an area close to a key border crossing between Israel and Gaza.

item.title: Xi to Trump: Rein in the Hawks Trying to Derail the Tariff Truce
item.description: China sought to depict a call between Xi Jinping and President Trump as an appeal from one strongman leader to another to run a tight ship and stay on...
